text: "Born to Be My Baby" is a 1988 song by American hard rock band Bon Jovi and is the second single from his fourth studio album New Jersey. It went to number 3 in the United States, number 7 in Ireland, number 8 in Canada, number 19 in New Zealand, number 22 in the United Kingdom, number 25 in Switzerland and number 30 in Australia. == References == Category:1988 songs Category:Bon Jovi songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Born to Be My Baby
